backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a slug-validation publish requirement to two frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining required assets and steps for building the Valentine SPA.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the SPA root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA component wiring together layout, sections, localStorage state, memory images, and edit panel.
frontend/src/components/valentine/EditPa: Editor side panel allowing content editing, image management, and Version 9 slug‑validated publishing workflow.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Footer: Footer showing sender name, year, and a tracked attribution link.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero section with animated heart decorations, headline, and a button scrolling to the letter.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveLe: Card-styled letter section showing recipient, body text, and sender with romantic formatting.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memori: Six‑slot polaroid-style gallery with normalization, fallback images, hover effects, and lightbox support.
Renders a themed memories section with a title and a MemoriesGallery using provided images and captions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Memory: Displays a fullscreen dialog showing a selected memory image with optional caption and a close button.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Shows a grid of cards listing reasons, each styled with icons and decorative effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Provides a page layout with fixed background texture, gradient overlay, and wrapped content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context and provider offering login, logout, and identity state.
Custom hook for syncing a state value with localStorage including error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemoryImages.ts: Manages six memory images with defaults, localStorage persistence, and helpers for updating and resetting images.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a Valentine-themed color scheme plus polaroid-style frame utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/validateProductionSlu: Validates a production slug for allowed characters and length, returning validity and error message.
frontend/src/valentine/contentDefaults.t: Provides default Valentine content including names, headline, letter text, reasons, and empty memory captions.
frontend/src/valentine/types.ts: Defines the ValentineContent interface describing the structure of customizable Valentine page content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project version 21 status, indicating Version 9 is built and ready for go‑live. Includes deployment notes, a slug validation issue, and a list of implemented Valentine‑site features.
